column2: Build lands and summon creatures to attack your enemy. Destroy their orb to win!
Welcome to Faeria! I'm Fugoro, your friendly --
Ack! Help me! I'll give you a reward!
3 faeria! I can summon a creature.
You'll need lands to summon that yak.
Creatures must wait one turn before attacking.
Crush that bandit so we can counterattack.
Move in and attack Sharra directly.
You can also press {GAMEPAD_BACK_BUTTONS_R2} as a shortcut to the wheel
Move your cursor to the Yak card and press {GAMEPAD_ACTION_CONFIRM}
Move your cursor here and HOLD {GAMEPAD_ACTION_CONFIRM} to pass your turn.
Move your cursor here and press {GAMEPAD_ACTION_CONFIRM} to build lands.
